data.text: @LeftwardSwing What my family are doing. Re-Homesteading 4.4 acres in very rural VT (Pop: 449). Working every day to pour our resources there. Start our 3 year on 5/1. 2 year goal: Living on the property w/unitalities, water, etc 24/7/365.
@LeftwardSwing Know that feeling of being trapped. Hope you find a solution.
@RadioFreeTroy Yes for me, I sure am, specifically this country. Too ill to travel.
@LeftwardSwing That's the Average Income in Thailand. You limiting yourself to Wealthy Countries?

@RadioFreeTroy I get a whopping $798/mo to try to live on. We disabled people are royally screwed unless we living in the middle of podunk where there's no goods or services. They have the audacity to let the wealthy dodge taxes while screwing all of us.

@LeftwardSwing I live so far below the Poverty Level it's like Flatland. Have for Decades. I did this out of Conviction. It will be this same Conviction that is finding my way to Thailand...where I'll no longer be impoverished.
@LeftwardSwing Dream would be to essentially be a hermit in Canada

@RadioFreeTroy You can't but understand at the same time, poor people like me don't have the cash to move. It sucks but there's not a whole lot I can do about it until this country truly believes housing is a human right & has the infrastructure & policy in place for that.
@LeftwardSwing Had I the money people would assume I had died
